definition: time trial (e.g. in cycle race)/timed race/competition against the clock
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Individual time trial in accordance with SAJ competition rules.
sentences.chinese: 個人計時賽皆根據SAJ競賽規則舉辦。

sentences.english: The official timed race began on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 正式計時賽於星期日拉開帷幕。

sentences.english: Start off is a key aspect to 500 meters time race of cycling events.
sentences.chinese: 自行車計時賽項目的出發動作是影響成績的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: Beat the target time in every Time Trial race.
sentences.chinese: 讓每場計時賽的時間記錄少於目標時間。

sentences.english: This is a full time trial project.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個完整的計時賽項目。

sentences.english: The game also features, single race, time trial, championship and reverse track modes.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲還採用單賽，計時賽，冠軍和反向追蹤模式。
